name: Project Moca
description:
Project Moca - Demo release "Game of year 2023" - me Project Moca is a side scrolling rhythm game, based off of an old outdated rhythm game named Rhythm Master. Hit notes as they come from the side of the screen. Basically Taiko, but with 4 notes and no drums

Join us on Discord!

Please note the current version is VERY buggy. Audio broke (it was working perfectly before compiling, weird) and the tutorial beatmap still isn't properly synced. If you find any other problems, please report them on our discord.

also rockerfeller street was ironically added i swear

Controls ActionControllerKeyboard (Default buttons)Up NotePlayStation: Triangle 
Xbox: Y

W or Up arrow key Left NotePlayStation: Square 
Xbox: XA or Left arrow keyDown NotePlayStation: Cross 
Xbox: AS or Down arrow key Right NotePlayStation: Circle 
Xbox: BD or Right arrow key End game (pause in a later update)PlayStation: Options 
Xbox: Start

Space

Keyboard keybinds remappable. 

Playable on Windows. Mac and Linux versions will be available when the game fully releases, with Android coming shortly after. All credits in game.

poopy
